title: Samsung ‘expected’ to adopt MediaTek chips in Galaxy S22 FE and Galaxy S23 in some regions
content:
Samsung’s Fan Edition series was a hit on debut, and while the latest model was delayed heavily, it still turned out to be a great device. Now, it seems the series is set for another shake-up, with the Galaxy S22 FE rumored to use a chipset from MediaTek, a choice that might even expand to the Galaxy S23 later.

more…

The post Samsung ‘expected’ to adopt MediaTek chips in Galaxy S22 FE and Galaxy S23 in some regions appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, Samsung could be adopting MediaTek chipsets with its Galaxy S22 FE, and maybe even Galaxy S23, too.
